segments.text: I'm just watching all these elements converging into potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is a serious slipping hazard for anyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman is just sloshing around in it, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's that boy, teetering precariously on his stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he's going to come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could hit his head, or break the plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling makes me truly apprehensive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is so close, she could easily be caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such obvious dangers being ignored by the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning, but I can't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness from the woman is genuinely concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to get hurt, I can feel it in my bones.
segments.speaker: PAR
